amendment.description: To modify the definition of custom-developed computer software.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1063 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1063 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Tillis to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5795) To modify the definition of custom-developed computer software.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1063 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1063 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Tillis to Amendment SA 1003.
